ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
ygData.msgSnippet: Well......it might be dumb to do that....just go and stand next to the guards of your local city and do the shout thing. Don t do it in the wide open..unless
ygData.messageBody:
Well......it might be dumb to do that....just go and stand next to the
guards of your local city and do the "shout" thing.

Don't do it in the wide open..unless you have something that makes you
faster, or have high magic resistance. But generally, from what I've
read/noticed...a lot of PKing is at the lower levels..just running around
the city gates. The higher you go, the less there is. Might be the
maturity level. Now don't get me wrong..there are PK guilds that have high
members, but the chances of running into them are much lower than being 1st
level and trying to get out of the city and actually do some REAL hunting.




"IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield" <persona@...> on 04/09/2001 12:07:31
PM

Please respond to EverQuest@yahoogroups.com

To: "'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'" <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
cc:
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers


Thanks for the tip...

Is it possible to do any trades?

I mean if i should be dumb and shout in commons that I want to trade 100pp
for something...is it possible? or do I have people trying to kill me as
soon as I shout?

And does the guard in the bank actually help me? or will I just be killed
there too?

> -----Original Message-----
> From: stonemn@... [SMTP:stonemn@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 06, 2001 8:03 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] PvP Servers
>
>
> Nope........can't take any bag that's on your person. Only items
> equipped,
> and not weapons that you have equipped either. However, if they have the
> Disarm skill, your weapon will go into your inventory list. And if you
> have an open main slot, and they kill you, they can get it then.
>
